title: #41 Danny & Bonnie Hunt
itunes:title: #41 Danny & Bonnie Hunt
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes one of his personal idols/mentors/heroes to the show, Bonnie Hunt. Bonnie talks about her work- Jerry Maguire, Return to Me, Jumanji, Cheaper By The Dozen, The Green Mile, Life with Bonnie, The Building, Toy Story 3, The Bonnie Hunt Show...
description:
Danny welcomes one of his personal idols/mentors/heroes to the show, Bonnie Hunt. Bonnie talks about her work- Jerry Maguire, Return to Me, Jumanji, Cheaper By The Dozen, The Green Mile, Life with Bonnie, The Building, Toy Story 3, The Bonnie Hunt Show, & more! 

*For bonus episodes, join the Patreon at www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic Web: www.EverythingIconic.com Twitter: www.Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino Instagram: www.Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

*Sponsored by Samson Technologies (SamsonTech.com)


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
